original_text: And it came to pass in those days, that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus that all the world should be taxed.
korean_text: 그 때에 가이사 아구스도가 영을 내려 천하로 다 호적하라 하였으니

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in those days
that there went out a decree
that all the world should be taxed
